Trade/Device Name(s): OK Meter Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): OK Meter Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OK Meter Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger for lay users and healthcare professionals as an aid to monitoring Diabetes Mellitus; not for use on neonates.
